mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.goods_no AS "goodsNo", a.out_date AS "outDate", a.contract_no AS "contractNo", a.custom_name AS "customName", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.car_count AS "carCount", a.goods_addr AS "goodsAddr", a.build_site AS "buildSite", a.notice_no AS "noticeNo", a.strength_grade AS "strengthGrade", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.water_meth AS "waterMeth", a.slumps_start AS "slumpsStart", a.slumps_end AS "slumpsEnd", a.custom_no AS "customNo", a.with_station AS "withStation", a.special_material AS "specialMaterial", a.repertory_name AS "repertoryName", a.curcar_count AS "curcarCount", a.mortar__count AS "mortarCount", a.about_num AS "aboutNum", a.goods_driver AS "goodsDriver", a.car_no AS "carNo", a.goods_increment AS "goodsIncrement", a.depart_time AS "departTime", a.reach_time AS "reachTime", a.unload_time AS "unloadTime", a.depart_person AS "departPerson", a.quality_person AS "qualityPerson", a.goods_clerk AS "goodsClerk", a.create_person AS "createPerson", a.check_person AS "checkPerson", a.check_status AS "checkStatus", a.make_date AS "makeDate", a.check_date AS "checkDate", a.total_cars AS "totalCars", a.total_cube AS "totalCube", a.goods_remark AS "goodsRemark", a.except_handle AS "exceptHandle", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_bill( id, goods_no, out_date, contract_no, custom_name, project_name, car_count, goods_addr, build_site, notice_no, strength_grade, goods_name, water_meth, slumps_start, slumps_end, custom_no, with_station, special_material, repertory_name, curcar_count, mortar__count, about_num, goods_driver, car_no, goods_increment, depart_time, reach_time, unload_time, depart_person, quality_person, goods_clerk, create_person, check_person, check_status, make_date, check_date, total_cars, total_cube, goods_remark, except_handle, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{goodsNo}, #{outDate}, #{contractNo}, #{customName}, #{projectName}, #{carCount}, #{goodsAddr}, #{buildSite}, #{noticeNo}, #{strengthGrade}, #{goodsName}, #{waterMeth}, #{slumpsStart}, #{slumpsEnd}, #{customNo}, #{withStation}, #{specialMaterial}, #{repertoryName}, #{curcarCount}, #{mortarCount}, #{aboutNum}, #{goodsDriver}, #{carNo}, #{goodsIncrement}, #{departTime}, #{reachTime}, #{unloadTime}, #{departPerson}, #{qualityPerson}, #{goodsClerk}, #{createPerson}, #{checkPerson}, #{checkStatus}, #{makeDate}, #{checkDate}, #{totalCars}, #{totalCube}, #{goodsRemark}, #{exceptHandle}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE goods_bill SET goods_no = #{goodsNo}, out_date = #{outDate}, contract_no = #{contractNo}, custom_name = #{customName}, project_name = #{projectName}, car_count = #{carCount}, goods_addr = #{goodsAddr}, build_site = #{buildSite}, notice_no = #{noticeNo}, strength_grade = #{strengthGrade}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, water_meth = #{waterMeth}, slumps_start = #{slumpsStart}, slumps_end = #{slumpsEnd}, custom_no = #{customNo}, with_station = #{withStation}, special_material = #{specialMaterial}, repertory_name = #{repertoryName}, curcar_count = #{curcarCount}, mortar__count = #{mortarCount}, about_num = #{aboutNum}, goods_driver = #{goodsDriver}, car_no = #{carNo}, goods_increment = #{goodsIncrement}, depart_time = #{departTime}, reach_time = #{reachTime}, unload_time = #{unloadTime}, depart_person = #{departPerson}, quality_person = #{qualityPerson}, goods_clerk = #{goodsClerk}, create_person = #{createPerson}, check_person = #{checkPerson}, check_status = #{checkStatus}, make_date = #{makeDate}, check_date = #{checkDate}, total_cars = #{totalCars}, total_cube = #{totalCube}, goods_remark = #{goodsRemark}, except_handle = #{exceptHandle}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
